relationship:regulation.name: regulation
relationship:regulation.label: Regulation
relationship:regulation.description: The upstream activity conditionally controls the downstream activity

relationship:constitutivelyUpstream.name: constitutivelyUpstream
relationship:constitutivelyUpstream.label: Constitutively Upstream
relationship:constitutivelyUpstream.description: The upstream activity is normally present and required for the downstream activity.

relationship:providesInputFor.name: providesInputFor
relationship:providesInputFor.label: Provides Input For
relationship:providesInputFor.description: The upstream activity produces a molecule that is an input for the downstream activity.

relationship:removesInputFor.name: removesInputFor
relationship:removesInputFor.label: Removes Input For
relationship:removesInputFor.description: The upstream and downstream activities have the same input but the upstream activity makes the input unavailable for the downstream activity.

relationship:undetermined.name: undetermined
relationship:undetermined.label: Undetermined
relationship:undetermined.description: There is insufficient data to specify a precise causal mechanism.

directness:direct.name: direct
directness:direct.label: Direct
directness:direct.description: The upstream activity immediately precedes the downstream activity

directness,indirect.name: indirect
directness,indirect.label: Indirect
directness,indirect.description: There are intervening activities between the upstream and downstream activities.
